text: Gumazitam kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgh suam, kɨ amizir igiar me na bagha inabazim, arazir aghuiba a gamir puvatɨ. Egha a bagha nɨghnɨgha, uan nivafɨzimɨn agoroguem dɨkabɨnamin gavgavim puvatɨ. Ezɨ a gari, tuaviba ua puvatɨ. Eghtɨ kamaghɨn a uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangɨ, aning uaning ikɨ. An arazir kuram gamir puvatɨ.
